topics.body:
"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553a5fdf63687246c0d30a00#post_553a5fdf63687246c0d30a00
Call me a jerk, but I have a feeling a requirement for being a writer on the show is that any pokemon that starts becoming too popular and might endanger Pikachu's popularity must go.

I mean think about it for a second; if you took a shot of tequila every time Ash let go or benched a popular pokemon not only you would be dead, but everyone here would be dead due to alcohol poisoning.

I may not watch the show, but even I know the entire story is:
Ash travels to a new region -> Pikachu goes back down to level 1 -> Team Rocket's blasting off again! -> Ash builds a new team of pokemon -> Ash makes new friends -> Ash let's go of his new pokemon -> Ash leaves his friends -> Ash leaves for a new region.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
